divs: Sighting DetailsI cannot write this down. its hard to explain, not how it looked but the behaviou. I am sure I could tell the story exactly. Its taken me 36 yrs to get to this point I've never told anyone.
Summary: i got a very close look at the ufo
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Red Bluff
